content.detailedDescription: Mom spotted it in the backyard night sky. clear sky, little to no clouds, full moon, center city location, no stars, big bright white object. odd. it seems to be stationary located a quarter up of the horizon. the full moon is behind me. it's sw of me. moon is rising in the se. i think it's a tv satellite. i took a non-digital photo. when i went back to re-photo w/ digital it had lowered & got hidden by building. there are only 2 blocks between my home & river so views of sw sky are good.
content.summary: Large, very bright, elongated, larger on one side then narrows.

content.detailedDescription: While exiting a restaurant on hamburger hill in west branch, michigan. my partner exclaimed that the moon appeared cracked. the full moon was about 30 degrees above the horizon in the eastern sky. it was daylight and the sky was clear. the object completely bisected the moon horizontally at midpoint making the moon appear split. the object appeared in the vicinity of the moon and would have to have been about 3500 kilometers long by 100 kilometers high. the object remained in the same trajectory as it appeared to move downward against our view of the moon and parallel to it. as it moved down from the face of the moon, the object was no longer visible. it appeared as a line completely bisecting the moon from mid-point moving to the bottom of the moon's face in about 6 seconds time or appearing to move over 200 km per second.
content.summary: Saw a black object bisect the full moon and move downward in 6 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on hwy 6 from gorman, tx toward deleon on my way to goldwaith, tx. i first saw a light that i thought was a shooting star or a fireworks rocket. i was supprised because the light appeared and did not go away. then to the side some distance between another light, then again the same equal distance another light, than a fourth light, but before the fourth light appeared the first disappeared. then before the fifth appeared the second light disappeared,and so on. after the sixth or seventh light appeared the lights quit and eventually all went away. this lasted about 20 to 30 sec. there was a short period, maybe 10 sec before the next series of lights started to appear over another area to the left of the first group of lights. all was very simular to the first group. then a third group to the right of the second group began to appear, but this time at least 7 or 8 lights all in a row appeared before any went away. next a forth group began to appear to the left of the third group. this time the lights had a double appearence, instead of one light there were two very close together then two more and two more and so on, but the first two disappeared before the fourth double light appeared. then back to the far left several miles in distance the fifth and final group appeared. there were six or seven lights in this group, the major difference of the fifth group was they were going away from me instead of across my vision. i kept trying to make out an object, but all i ever saw were amber lights. i was excied to see such a sight. i did not tell anyone about this for three days.
content.summary: Series of amber lights appearing and then dissipating/lights were always spaced equal distance between each other.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on the road from athens to j.J.'s flea market at around 6am. the road when it lets out from athens is mlk jr drive and changes to 441(?) i think. just before j.J's and after the bulldog inn motel is the stretch of road where we saw it. we saw a massive white light of a unusual shape at a high speed go over us and then down to the ground. i can't belive there wasn't a news report about it or something. it wasn't a meteor because of it's shape and size (if a meteor that big hit the ground they would have told us). very weird stuff... we both saw it till it went lower than the tree line... we were shocked by it.
content.summary: Bright large white light, low flying, fast, possibly crashing?

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i both saw this event.  we were driving south on i-29 near onawa, ia on 12/28/2009 at approx 7:30pm cst.  i looked to my left (towards the eastern sky) and noticed a pair of bright star-like objects.  they were at distance, approximately half the distance of castor and pollux apart, and the initial magnitude of each was brighter than venus.  i alerted my wife and we both witnessed them dim in unison to nothing.  i would estimate that they were to be at approximately 30 degrees above the eastern horizon when we saw them.  i���m suggesting that they were at a distance (20 to 100 plus miles) because the appeared to be star-like.  in the time that we saw them (approx. 10 seconds), they did not move in relation to each other or the stars around them.  the magnitude of each was the same as the other while they dimmed.  i was shocked by the objects ability to dim in unison.
content.summary: Pair of star-like objects dim together.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside my friend's car in the parking lot of discount liquors in fairfield and i noticed 3 very bright red lights in a triangle formation.  for the first 2-3 seconds, i thought they were the red lights on the air traffic towers, because of the same red color and brightness, but after that i noticed they weren't blinking at all and the 3 were moving synchronously towards us at a relatively slow pace - like what a passenger jet at full speed & altitude looks like from the ground is my best approximation.  

i told him to check it out and he got out of the car and we both stood there and watched through a clear sky as the three lights went directly over our heads from the west and out to the east towards clifton/newark/jersey city.

we couldn't take our eyes off the thing and got a good look at it/them.  there were no discernible lines/shapes that connected the lights to one another yet they were moving in a synchronous fashion.  neither of us had ever seen anything like that in our lives (i'm 24, hes 20), so we were just calling people that lived east of us and trying to get them to witness it too.  one other person on the phone at the actual time we saw it was in verona and got a view of it with binoculars and told us he was seeing 5 lights (like the other new jersey guy in january taped).  

other people in the area saw this same thing on 2/7/09 around the same time.  one video is here - http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=bczbmfdvcni .  the other person who reported seeing it had just left a comment on this video http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=radnhyqpwq4 that was in a different location, but still the same red lights.

we eventually lost sight of the object due to a combination of long distance & light scattered cloud cover, but could still see glimpses of individual lights at times.
content.summary: 3 - 5 red lights in triangle pattern in new jersey february 7, 2009 - essex county.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside my friend's car in the parking lot of discount liquors in fairfield and i noticed 3 very bright red lights in a triangle formation.  for the first 2-3 seconds, i thought they were the red lights on the air traffic towers, because of the same red color and brightness, but after that i noticed they weren't blinking at all and the 3 were moving synchronously towards us at a relatively slow pace - like what a passenger jet at full speed & altitude looks like from the ground is my best approximation.  

i told him to check it out and he got out of the car and we both stood there and watched through a clear sky as the three lights went directly over our heads from the west and out to the east towards clifton/newark/jersey city.

we couldn't take our eyes off the thing and got a good look at it/them.  there were no discernible lines/shapes that connected the lights to one another yet they were moving in a synchronous fashion.  neither of us had ever seen anything like that in our lives (i'm 24, hes 20), so we were just calling people that lived east of us and trying to get them to witness it too.  one other person on the phone at the actual time we saw it was in verona and got a view of it with binoculars and told us he was seeing 5 lights (like the other new jersey guy in january taped).  

other people in the area saw this same thing on 2/7/09 around the same time.  one video is here - http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=bczbmfdvcni .  the other person who reported seeing it had just left a comment on this video http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=radnhyqpwq4 that was in a different location, but still the same red lights.

we eventually lost sight of the object due to a combination of long distance & light scattered cloud cover, but could still see glimpses of individual lights at times.
content.summary: Those damned 3/5 red lights again.

content.detailedDescription:
If you have read my article "aliens live in our earth's atmosphere" and saw my drawings of aliens spacecrafts, you will understand at once that we deal with extraterrestrial beings. in addition to that i have every day visual contact with them. normally they stay in one place in the sky, but as soon as i look at afo it starts to move in my direction with the accelerated speed from 0 to 100 miles an more per second,no matter how far it is located from me, but if i wave my hand to them they begin to zigzag in my direction and stop right over my head. 

another words they communicate with me by using so called "body language"(zigzag movement), that they happy to see me again, like a dog wiggle his tail to show that he is happy. 
sometimes when i look at afos, they by their movement describe in the sky letter s, the first letter 
of my last name, from here follows that they can read my mind at such distance or intercept my communications on internet. 
i know that what i discovered in my article is beyond human's imagination, that is why i offer people my assistance to locate afos in the sky first time, after that everyone can spot them without my help. 
sincerely 
ilya
content.summary: Aliens live in our earth's atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance was out on out terrace when she called me to come out. there have been reports in the past 2 months sightings.

we saw 3 very bright red lights in a trianlge shape hovering over the morrstiown area. after a minute or so, the 3 lights formed a single line of lights and began to move slowly  north towards the parsippany area. i looked at the clouds and they we moving south east, so i didn't belive the wind was moving the object since they were moving north. once over the parsippany area, they formed a triangle again and hovered. the lower red light moved up to one of the red lights while the other red light stayed in place. then it moved back down to it's original place, forming a triangle again. 

the red lights then were in cloud cover and we could no longer see them.
content.summary: 3 bright red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in stephenville, tx; however, due to a grass fire i was out at our property near desdemona, tx (actually north of desdemona proper...And approx 30 minutes west of stephenville). i was standing on the porch of our cabin, surveying the land, and something in the southeast corner of our property in the sky caught my eye. it was an unusual pattern of lights that appeared, and was unlike anything i have ever seen, then it disappeared. i was still watching the sky and further east of the original sighting a string of 5 or so lights lit up in a sequence..In a straight line formation then disappeared. this happened shortly before 7:30. it was so bizarre that after i witnessed these lights, i thought to grab my cell phone to see what time it was. it was exactly 7:30 on my phone when i checked it. i am 36 years old and never in my life have i seen lights in the night sky appear, disappear and behave in such a manner. this was not an airplane...No question...

shortly after that, i texted my husband in a few text messages. i have since taken a photo of my text history for proof...
content.summary: Unidentified lights, unusual sequence, then disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on i-64 around the 104-98 mile marker .When i saw a bright light coming from behind me,but it was up in  the sky not on the ground ,so i knew it wasnt a car or truck with there lights on bright.It whent over head of my truck ,it caused all my light to cut off for about 3-4 seconds it also made the light on the sides of the road go out also,there was atruck in from of me his lights also went out,and also the truck and car i was meeting,lost all power .After the object whent over me i could see that it was real big twice as wide as the interstate,and as long as it was wide.It also made the truck loose even engine power ,my truck coasted down to 55 mph before the lights and engine gained back power.I picked up my cb mic and asked the driver in front of me what the heck it was he replied i dont know but i hope it doesnt do it again . i asked him was that a ufo and he said  "it sure wasnt an airplane it was too big to have been one of them.After the object flew over us it headed in a westerly direction ,then made a hard right towards the north ,thats when i got a good look at it from the side it whent between me and the moon,and within seconds it gone as fast as lightning. it seemed to shine brighter about a second before it went into warp speed or whatever you call it..
content.summary: It was real big about 1/2 mile wide 3/4 mile long at least had blue-red-green-yellow lights on bottom,also some clear lights.

content.detailedDescription: At 9:00 last night i went to my back yard to straighten it up for the mowing service. i noticed it was a clear night so i looked at the moon and the stars in the sky.  i saw a very bright light in the sky over my neighbors house.  i would say about 500-1000 feet in the air.  i thought it was an airplane coming this way so i didnt think anymore of it.  i went back inside the house to get my 8yr old daughter to help with the yard and thats when i noticed the light had not moved and it was not making any noise. i then got my binoculars and looked at it and just saw more light.  i brought my wife outside to look at it with the binoculars and she could not make much out of it either.  my daughter said she saw it blink and i saw a red light on the bottom for a brief second and then go off.  about 10 minutes into watching it now i noticed that the light had moved a little.  it was going below the horizon.  it took about 30 minutes for it to leave my sight below the other houses.  i saw passenger airliners fly in that direction and i wondered if anyone saw the same light and what they thought of it. i kept thinking to myself that if it was a star or other celestial object, it should have been more stationary.  if it was an aircraft, it should have made noise and had blinking lights on it.  if you could picture the brightest star in the sky and multiply that by 100, you could get an idea of what we saw. i've seen numerous shooting stars, satellites, planets, and comets, but i've never seen anything like this before.  i'm going outside tonight at the same time to see if i can see it again.  if i do, i'll have my video camera ready.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky that was stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were coming back from ft worth on hwy 377 on jan 30 2009.
1/2 mile north of stephenville city limit we witnessed 2 bright lights that appeared to be heading in a direction ssw just to the west of the city of dublin tx. the lights were quite bright with a very slight yellow to amber tint. the sky was clear and the time on my car clock was 7:00 pm
exactly. unfortunately i did not pull over as there was not an appropriate shoulder to do so. but as i slowed, for 1-1/2 to 2 minutes, my wife and i witnessed the 2 lights that were the same distance apart.
(i did not have a good reference to establish distance apart or distance away from us). i estimated the altitude at 1000 to 1500 ft. the light on our right became 2 then 3 lights while the light on our left remained static. if you can imagine the following 'o' as lights:  o   o  becoming
 o  oo  and then o  ooo then o  o. the lights were brighter than a small plane and did not flash or beacon. unfortunately hwy 377 entering stephenville drops off a rise that hid the lights from our view as the lights dropped below the tree tops.
content.summary: 2 bright lights moving ssw of stephenville tx.

content.detailedDescription: In back porch, porch lit up with flashing colored lights.  i looked out screen door and backyard and shed near house were lit up like daylight, but the lights were colors continuously flashing - red, green, blue, red, green, blue.  looked up in the sky, and saw nothing, it was silent outside.  initial thought was that it was some type of emergency vehicle driving into our neighborhood, so i went through my house and out my front door - nothing.  not even 5 minutes later, my teenage son and his 2 friends came into the house yelling and asking if i saw that...They proceeded to tell me that while driving to our house they saw the whole sky light up with colored lights.  while yelling about the lights they saw, one of their cell phones rang and it was one of the teen's mom calling from the house they just left asking if they saw anything while driving.  i have no explanation, know what we all saw, hence my search on the internet.  i had no idea there were sightings in this area, etc., until reading about the conference you just held at bccc.  hope my information helps you in your research.
content.summary: Flashing colored lights - red, green, blue - lit up backyard.

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:27 a.M. cst i went out on my back deck.  it was dawn and a large,  airplane like craft hovered, low, over a cornfield next to far oaks golf course in caseyville, il.  i noticed the object because it was eye level.  the craft was bright white and stationary like a star, but could not have been a star because it was too low and too large.  the craft was hovering very low and looked rather large to be a small personal airplane.  then the craft ascended slowly and seemed to break apart-- it looked like 2 airplanes flying side by side on an angle.  the wings of the 2 craft almost touched.  then the craft came back together and i went in the house to get binoculars.   when i came back outside the craft had moved behind trees and was too far away to get a good description of it. the entire time the craft / crafts were bright white like a star.  at 6:50 a.M. i heard what sounded like a military helicopter in the direction the craft disapeared.  lately i have seen several military helicopters in our neighborhood in the evening. i feel confident it was most likely military even though i did not see it.  i was alone during this sighting and was not afraid.  i am not sure how to describe the shape of the craft.  airplane - like, star - like and chevron - like all seem to apply.  

this is the interesting thing.  last year on january 17, 2008, i reported a triangle shaped craft right here at far oaks to mufon.  i saw the craft on january 16, 2008.  if you read my report from that night, i noted that two planes seemed to be flying too close together.  i assumed they were two personal aircraft and at the time was more focused on the black triangle flying around the neighborhood.  i did speak with someone from mufon after this sighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white object that seemed to break apart, rejoin and change shape hovered over cornfield next to far oaks golf course.

content.detailedDescription:
I am walking at the right shoulder of the national highway san fernando city la union, philippines at about 7:45 pm from my boarding house back to the office when i noticed a triangle shape with several yellow lights slowly flying/moving in an etimated 100 ft. high with no sounds from south to north direction and suddenly stop for a couple of minutes that made me also stop walking.

there were some people standing along the national highway as there are esblishments in this area like that of a gasoline station but they did not notice the said flying object that at that time was in stationary position.

i supposed to call the attention of these people to look what i am  seeing in the sky but the flying object slowly moves heading the direction of north west until it got lost in my sight.

it came into my mind that this object is a real ufo because this is now my third time to see ufos since 1994 and it was one of a kind experienced from the 3 encounters i had.
content.summary: A tirangle shape flying object  in more than 100 feet high with several yellow lights slowly moving in north direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my daughters dog who was staying with me at 6:30 a.M. on 10/20/07. i glanced up directly overhead and noticed how bright and clear the stars appeared. suddenly, there appeared at about 80 degrees elevation above the western horizon 10-12 glowing rectangular (or filament/string shaped objects). the objects orbited back and forth around each other resembling a flock of feeding sea gulls that glowed as the entire group moved slowly from east to west. after about 20 seconds when the grouping had reached an elevation of about 60 degrees above the western horizon, the entire group vanished. i thought maybe at first that these objects were meteors or possibly some space junk burning up. however, they were orbiting back against each other contrary to the motion of the entire group of objects and this motion frightened me. also, these objects produced no discernible noise at all. i am familiar with almost every type of aircraft and these things did not resemble an aircaft of any kind. i'd rather not see something like this again.
content.summary: 10-12 rectangular objects appeared overhead. resembled a flock of circling sea gulls.

content.detailedDescription:
Amsume bright yellow light split into 3 making a triangle the split into 8 or 9 making a cercle and spinning then took off like a lightning bolt with what looked like 5 explosions whech made no sound it didnt take off tell fighter planes came in from what looked like the north west also the 3 lights went harizontal and verticle befor turning into 8 or 9 lights
these lights were very brighti was told by people comming towards stephenville from i 20 south that they saw it too and one person also said that cars were pulled off of 377 between stephenville and dublin both ways watching this. i've also spoke to experts that saw it and say that they were not flares.
content.shape: Circle,  Diamond,  Fireball,  Flash,  Saturn-like,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: Amazing.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were sitting in my back yard just enjoying the warm weather, there was not a cloud in the sky i looked toward the mountains (west) and noticed a really bright light in the sky at first i thought it to be venus but as i scanned the sky i found venus, by this time my brother noticed the light and said to me "hey check out that light it's moving" startled i turned back to the light and sure enough it was moving. at that moment i thought ok this must be a helicopter after about 30 seconds of really watching it. it started to move in circles and making sharp course corrections, i'm a private pilot so watching it maneuver like the way it was threw the helicopter idea out the window, i also made sure it was not just on the mountain (ie. a snow cat on a ski run). i went inside to get my night vision scope to maybe discern strobes, me and my brother took turns for about a half hour watching it with our naked eye and the night scope we found there were no strobes just the light itself would seem to dim then get very bright. we watched in amazement until about 20:40 mst when the movement stopped then slowly started to descend and then the light just "blinked" out. i say blinked because it did not fade just one second it was there and the next it was gone. my brother and i stood there until about 21:00 mst waiting to see if it would return but did not.
content.summary: Bright odd moving light in the western sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of 2/5/09 at approx 2320 hrs i noticed 5 objects that were hovering in the sky around the academy rd exit. i was driving up 95 north from philadelphia. these objects started to move very slowing . i followed them all the way up 95 to the new hope exit. they were also flying in formation and flying very close to each other at times. they were not helecopters some had a boomarang shape, other did not. people were pulling over and slowing down to try to figure out what the hell they were looking at. i called a co- worker on my cell phone who was driving up 95 as well and asked him if he saw these things. he said he did and had no idea what they were. while i was talking to him my cell phone went dead in a area i never lose cell. by the time i got to the new hope exit i pulled over and watched these objects start to circle the area. very very strange. they were not high in the sky and i could barely hear them. by 12:30 am they were gone very quickly. 

please get in touch with me 

{pid}

{cms/jat/pid} text moved to narrative
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 5 objects hovering, flying in formation and very close to each other.

content.detailedDescription:
I looked south toward green valley and was what appreared to be a very bright star flashing many colors.  it was very low on the horizon.  i got out my binocs (11x80) for a closer look.  the object was stationary in the sky for appox 15 minutes.  during the viewing, a second object of the same description and the same intensity lowers itself from the first one and hovered below it.  it assended and lowered three times during the viewing.

i called 911 to report it.  the operator said he had heard of no other reports about t.
content.summary: Bright flashing star low in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
For 4 years, my wife and i have lived near one of the highest spots on the top of a mountain in hot springs, sd which is in the black hills.  four times over a period of the last 2 1/2 weeks i have seen a long rectangular (ruler looking in shape) object with windows, the windows had white lights that appeared to go from dim to bright from the inside.  there were also red lights that seemed to move through the windows at a less consistent rate.  there were two dimmer lights in pale green on each end, with one large orange light randomly coming on in the middle of the object (not appearing to be a window) lasting for two to three seconds.   i did not see this object every single night, but on the 5th and 6th of february, i did see it both evenings.  it did not appear to be in the exact same location each night that i have seen it (i would estimate that it may have moved a mile to a mile and a half in location). 

when i saw the object on feb 5th, i called the fall river sheriff���s department at approximately 8:00 pm.   shortly before 9:00pm he arrived on my land to look at the object in question.  after looking at it, he was unsure of what it was and left to check it out.  about 40 min later, i saw what appeared to be two helicopters flying over the area 3 times within 20 min.  it seemed as if they approached the areal slowly and then turned around and flew away faster than they went in.   about 15 min later, the sherriff called be back and said that he believed there was a construction site on the other side of the mountain and i was seeing lights from the equipment at that site.  right after his call, i decided to go see this construction site for myself.   i drove to the area beyond the mountain and there was nothing there!   after that, i drove south to the hot springs airport, it was closed, but hovering 1-3 feet off the runway with the lights on was a helicopter inside of the fence of the airport.  i tried to get their attention, but they would not come talk to me.

i have never seen anything like this before and would normally consider myself to be a skeptic, but after seeing this four time in 2 ��� weeks, i am beginning to think something is really going on here.    i tried to take pictures of this, but my camera is not the best and could not zoom in very far.    if you contact me, i am willing to try to share the pictures i���ve taken but i am not normally a ���computer user��� so sending these things are very foreign to me!


points you wanted clarified:

#1 - i was outside taking my 6 months old puppy to potty.

#2 - i noticed the lights in the distance that i had never seen before.

#3 - at first i thought my neighbor on the mountain next o me might be building a new house.  but after checking with him, he was also concerned as he is not building anything on his land.

#4 - descriptions of the event is above.

#5 ��� the first time i saw it, i wrote it off as nothing because i figured it was a house being built, but is did seem strange to me that if it was a new construction, how did they get so far, so fast?

#6 - in the morning, when the light came up, i could not see it anymore.
content.summary: Ruler shaped, windows, white lights in windows with red lights moving through, bright orange light in the middle of object.

content.detailedDescription: Just a story ran in the irish sun 2 days in a row over the 5th and 6th of february about a ufo wave that is gripping ireland at the moment, the pictures that were in paper are very similar to the stephenville lights
content.summary: Ufos seen all over ireland.

content.detailedDescription:
I was 16 years old at the time, and it was sometime in november. i don't remember the exact day. i decided to go get a hair cut. so i borrowed my mom's car and headed out. it was between 7-8 in the evening. it was dark too. the first thing i noticed as i was driving along was the unusual amount of lights in the sky. there were a number of planes or helicopters all over, but not close enough for me to hear or identify them. 

as i traveled west on sycamore in pasadena, tx, i came to t interesection and stop sign at beltway 8. i believe its called e sam houston parkway now. back then it was not a toll road. i looked to my left and saw the traffic was stopped down at the spencer hwy intersection. i turned right and headed north. almost immediately i looked over to my left and saw something that grabbed my attention.

about a hundred yards across beltway 8 from my location (i measured it on google earth) there is a field with 2 bill boards on the north and south side. hovering above the field was a large black shape. it was between the bill boards (at least appeared to be so). it had no lights on it. i slowed down to almost a complete stop, turned off the radio, and rolled down the window. there was no sound coming from the object.

i should have stopped the car and gotten out so i could get a really good look, but i was so surprised i didn't really think about it. within a minute from me sighting the "craft" it began to slowly ascend into the sky. it was quite large, but i could not see any detail because it was blacked out. i am not sure if it was a "saucer" shape or not since i was looking at it from the side. but it was not very thick.

i circled around at the u-turn on pine as it slowly moved upward. when i was under it on the opposite side from where i started i could tell it was quite wide. i circled around back at spencer and watched it float high and higher, and i ended up at a light down by pasadena blvd/red bluff intersections. at some point the dark shape lit up into a ball of light. i'm not sure how else to describe it.

then suddenly it flashed northward toward me. when i say it flashed i actually mean it flashed. it moved so fast that it left a trail of light behind it. as it came toward my location it did a 180 degree change in flight and flashed southward toward the gulf of mexico and did a zig zag. again, it moved so fast that it left a light trail behind it. it looked to have slightly ascended in its trajectory as it took off.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo sighting in pasadena tx november 1991.

content.detailedDescription: Saw about 6 ufos out of are atmosphere 2 went south west 3 went west 1 went north...Then one that ive seen low to the ground several times almost came over me and my son with looked like a round yellowish lght..Then stoped a different light came on looked light a firey throust then took off going up almost were you cant even see it..Also ive notice more stars out lately bout they also seem to sway but stay in same position...Always between 6 am and 640 am.. cant get video to dark and not a good enough camera
content.summary: My son and i saw ufo come over us, stoped then took off straight up.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend was letting the dog out and i asked him to take a picture of the moon, he did so and when he brought the camera to me to see the image he got we both immediately noticed the shape of a dropa stone above the moon, at once we both looked at each other and asked what is that?
content.summary: Took a digital picture of the moon, when i reviewed the picture above the moon i can see a round shape that looks alot like a dropa stone and it is huge!

content.detailedDescription: Possible...Tryed to figure out some other reason for these things being in the picture but could not. we have had a long history of happenings. call me crazy, but this piture is crazy to. all the pictures is not edited or filtered at 1200dpi scanned on a scanner from a photo that was stored for around 15 years. it is not faked. the first is the whole dark picture. the second is a section just left of my fathers face. the 3rd picture is of a section above that nearing the top of the window cover. if you look closly you will see what i see.
content.summary: Brought up the brightness of an old picture and saw this.

content.detailedDescription: I stayed in an oceanfront hotel room across from waikiki beach and was taking photos of the sunset from my balcony. i noticed these two objects in the sky months later when looking at the digital pictures.  i tried zooming in on the objects and it doesnt look like a bird or an airplane at all.  all i can say is it appears to be an unidentified flying object...
content.summary: Saucer shaped objects in the sky above waikiki beach.

content.detailedDescription: I was burning my east field on my farm and a ball like thing coame down in my northewest field and it choped down the tall grass in my field it went over my house and dropped a marble like thing on my house it almost caught it on fire  i went over there was wording of some kind copped down in the grass i still have the marble like thing
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Circle,  Flash,  Oval
content.summary: Really weird object droping marble like objects.

content.detailedDescription: We were hunting and liked came out of nowere itwas comingabout 3feet above us and me and my dad jumped down it stayed directly above us for about 30 sec and it moved to our truck and it dropped a firerey marblr on it was ot big at all it was as big as our dog a 4year old lab
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Circle,  Cross,  Disc,  Flash,  Oval,  Triangle,  Other
content.summary: It was wierd it came about 2 feet above my truck it like threw some thing fiery on it and melted a hole on top.
